name: JUMPHIKE
description:
This is a one button game about hiking, but also jumping.
           This is JUMPHIKE.

HOW

Press the spacebar, click, or tap to jump.
Don't jump into the side of walls.
Small jumps build up speed.
Hold it to jump higher, but lose speed.

HIGH SCORE

@Spootaloo 31.93 seconds
https://twitter.com/Spootaloo/status/1163934063238897665?s=20


LATEST

Version 1.1

-FIXED dying while the screen is too high
-FIXED spamming inputs at the end and timer going up
-FIXED multiple lives taken
-ADDED version number

CREDITS

SFX from Freesound.org
